attributes.action: Amendments to the Care Act 2014 and Housing Act 1988
attributes.additional_details:
2 Nov 2016 National exposure BBC2 Victoria Derbyshire. Overwhelming public response.

3 Nov 2016. BBC2 Victoria Derbyshire.  Interview with Local Government Ombudsman.

3 November 2016 Adjournment Debate, Peter Heaton-Jones MP.  Your Voice Matters CIC campaign mention. Consequences of raising concerns to care home providers and Recommendations.
http://ow.ly/ljQX306glCM

AND

16 November 2016 Social Care Debate.  Alistair Burt MP
Your Voice Matters CIC campaign mention.
http://ow.ly/fBnZ306jmAS
attributes.background:
2010 Your Voice Matters began campaigning on banning and evictions by care home providers. My story http://ow.ly/jz12306gl9c

Summer 2016 Your Voice Matters launch Rights 2 Speak Up 4 Care
http://www.yourvoicematters.org.uk/rights2speakup4care

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly the changes that you would like Parliament to make to these laws.
